name: in My MIND.
description: in My MIND. is a shooting game with metaphors about mind and feelings. Face 18 different negative emotions. Your goal is to overcome them without being defeated.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Series Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
